item.title: R Milestones
item.description: Proud to have finally met some basic programming milestones in R. A couple of months ago, I was finally able to write a function. For the longest time, I wanted to be able to loop over a column and place the grade point in a new column. I finally accomplished this task. Here is the basic code. lang_pts <- numeric(0) for(i in mq1_lang$langGrade){ lang_pts<- c(lang_pts,switch(i, "A" =4, "B"=3, "C"=2, "D"=1, "F"=0, "I"=0)) lang_pts } mq1_lang <- cbind(mq1_lang, lang_pts)
